tweets.text: üî∏ Phases 2 & 3 are not yet approved by planning authorities,and it is unclear how funding will be allocated to them.
@Severnsidebirds @EnvAgency Great photos paul, are all the fences still up around the site?

@nelliephant @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Yes good plan @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA - let's cut down half a rain forrest to write letters to tell them what they already know. You could have put that money to better use & buy air purifiers to help the people that are being poisoned and you are facilitating it #stopthestink

A cold day with a bitter North wind seems to be delaying the arrival of many migrants. One new arrival was a male Marsh Harrier that hunted successfully over what remains (25% removed by @EnvAgency ) of the reed bed on Pilning Wetland. It also flushed out 3 Green Sandpipers. https://t.co/fupwBI3dgv

Rather curiously there hasn't been a single Tweet from the @EnvAgency in the last 24 hours bragging about how they 'Enhance", the environment.

https://t.co/WaaFQXr1lZ

tweets.text: Can they really call themselves the Environment Agency when they‚Äôve sent out pointless letters to the whole of Newcastle and parts of Stoke? What a waste of paper! @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA #StopTheStink

@EnvAgency Rather than wasting time and money trying to justify the wanton neglect of our rivers how about regulating and prosecuting the polluters - mainly our river companies. Here's a pick of some stuff we pulled out of the Lea today. Loads of sanitary waste in there!!! https://t.co/YcExo8JItn

Just look how close this is to homes.
#StopTheStink üôè please retweet and get this trending
Itv are now on this but let's ramp it up! https://t.co/vGj3wVjFFQ

¬£58 billion profit since privatisation
3.1 million hours of untreated sewage dumped in 2020.
The Water industry is passionate about;
a) The Environment?
b) Money? https://t.co/mcwajhIoNJ

@SianieRoo @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @AnnaTurns @ClareDinnisEA @JeremyVineOn5 Railway worker, bus drivers, surgeons, nurses and taxi drivers to name a few, how can they safely do their job on little or no sleep after choking on toxic putrid Landfill gases all night in their homes? #stopthestink

entity.name: Scandal
entity.description: Olivia Pope, a former media relations consultant to the president, is ready to move on with her life and opens her own crisis-management firm, but she can't seem to shake ties with her past. Pope's staff includes womaniser-turned-family man Stephen Finch, slick litigator Harrison Wright and hacker extraordinaire Huck. As she moves forward it becomes clear that while her staffers may specialise in cleaning up the lives of other people, they can't seem to do the same for themselves.

tweets.text:
Landfill sites are causing widespread mental and physical suffering to residents living nearby, not to mention the detrimental impact on the environment! Something needs to change!
#landfill #landfillgas #environnement #environmentlaw #pollution #AirPollution #mullaghglass https://t.co/7Tya6z0JYE

Read our latest update for #WalleysQuarry landfill site here üëâhttps://t.co/o558iAVicn

We're visiting the surrounding area on an almost daily basis to carry out odour amenity checks. We're also continuing to inspect the site, including monitoring the progress of the capping. https://t.co/FsLQlvsU0f

anyone affected by the landfill stink at Whalley's quarry please consider signing this #StopTheStink 

Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites https://t.co/YfpXRi3qTf

1,168 complaints to the @EnvAgency in 6 days - the only reason they are now taking some form of action even though it‚Äôs not as stringent as it should be. Keep up the reporting - it‚Äôs forcing them to listen @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe @itvnews #panorama https://t.co/wgy76rYwCx
